snippet: On paper, Japan Airlines is on track for a strong recovery after it eliminated one-third of its work force, or about 16,000 jobs, dropped unprofitable routes and slashed pensions.
abstract: On paper, Japan Airlines is on track for a strong recovery after it eliminated one-third of its work force, or about 16,000 jobs, dropped unprofitable routes and slashed pensions.

headline.main: JAL Plans an I.P.O. to Raise $8.5 Billion
headline.print_headline: Airlines: Japan Airlines Plans To Relist Its Shares In Tokyo
